channel.title: ● Sources ●
channel.description:
[center][size=13pt]● Welcome ●[/size]
[s]I'm looking for a good source and i want someone to give me a great example. I want it to be a pk source. I want you to rate the best one. I also would like a link if it's possible.[/s]
[size=13pt]● Slivion ●[/size]
[i]Nevermind, i'm just using the default pimpscape.[/i]

Not off the download list though.[/center]

item.title: ● Sources ●
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Horror-Moss

It’s my server. It was based on the Phonescape source, the reason I think you should use it is because it’s got quite alot in it skillwise. Firemaking, Smithing, Woodcutting, Farming (Very hard to understand) and other stuff. To understand Farming you’ll need to read the coding. Search for this (I think);

//Start of farming

Assuming you’ll use this, hehe. Anyway, other than that, Phonescape’s a great source to work on imo.

Read full topic
